FAQ

Common Questions

Everything you need to know about our affordable unlimited plans

Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's nationwide 4G LTE and 5G network, giving you coverage in 99% of the country. You get the same towers and coverage as AT&T customers at a fraction of the cost.

Correct! Vouch Mobile never performs credit checks. Everyone gets approved instantly regardless of credit history. We believe great wireless shouldn't depend on your credit score.

Yes! We make it easy to transfer your existing number from any carrier. The process typically takes just a few minutes during activation.

On our unlimited plans, you'll never be charged overage fees. After using your high-speed data allotment, speeds may be reduced during network congestion, but you'll always stay connected.

No hidden fees, ever. The price you see is the price you pay. Taxes and regulatory fees are included in your monthly bill.

Activation is simple! Order your free SIM card (or use eSIM for instant activation), download the Vouch Mobile app, and follow the easy setup steps. Most customers are up and running in under 5 minutes.
